/**

function countDiff(a, b) {
  return a
    .split('')
    .map((charA, i) => charA === b[i] ? 0 :1)
    .reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)
}


/**
 * æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æã—ã¦å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’è¿”ã™

function createWordCount(text) {

  // ã‚ˆãå‡ºã‚‹è¨€ã„å›ã—ã§WordCloudã‹ã‚‰é™¤å¤–ã—ãŸã„å˜èªã‚’åˆ—æŒ™  
  const excludeWords = [

    /** (ç•¥)é™¤å¤–ã—ãŸã„å˜èª */
  ]


  /** kuromoji.jsã«ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹è¾æ›¸ã®æ ¼ç´å ´æ‰€ */
  const DIC_URL = 'node_modules/kuromoji/dict'

  /** WordCloudã§ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹å“è©ï¼ˆåŠ©è©ãƒ»åŠ©å‹•è©ãªã©ã¯çœãï¼‰ */
  const TARGET_POS = ['åè©']

  /** kuromoji.jsã§è©²å½“ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã®å€¤ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã«è¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å€¤ */
  const NO_CONTENT = '*'

  // kuromoji.jsã§å½¢æ…‹ç´ è§£æ
  // å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {

    kuromoji.builder({ dicPath: DIC_URL }).build((err, tokenizer) => {
      if(err){
        return reject(err)
      }

      // å˜èªã”ã¨ã®å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›
      const words = tokenizer.tokenize(text)
        .filter(t => TARGET_POS.includes(t.pos))
        .map(t => t.basic_form === NO_CONTENT ? t.surface_form : t.basic_form)
        .reduce((data, text) => {
          // å¤§æ–‡å­—ã¨å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã›ãšå‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã™ã‚‹
          const upperText = text.toUpperCase()
          if (excludeWords.includes(upperText)) {
            return data
          }

          const target = data.find(c => c.text === upperText)

          // å‡ºç¾å›æ•°ã¯å¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã—ãªã„ãŒã€å®Ÿéš›ã®ç”Ÿã®å˜èªã¯å¾Œã®å‡¦ç†ã§ä½¿ã†ãŸã‚ã¨ã£ã¦ãŠã
          if(target) {
            target.size = target.size + 1
            if(!target.rawTexts.includes(text)) {
              target.rawTexts.push(text)
            }
          } else {
            data.push({
              text: upperText,
              rawTexts: [ text ],
              size: 1,
            })
          }
          return data
        }, [])
        .map(data => {

          // ä¸Šè¨˜å‡¦ç†ã§ä¿æŒã—ã¦ãŠã„ãŸç”Ÿã®å˜èªã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«ã€ä¸€ç•ªå¤§æ–‡å­—ãŒå¤šã„å˜èªã‚’WordCloudã®å˜èªã¨ã—ã¦æ¡ç”¨ã™ã‚‹
          // ä¾‹ãˆã°Gatsbyã¨gatsbyã§ã‚ã‚Œã°Gatsbyã‚’æ¡ç”¨
          const almostSameText = data.rawTexts.map(text => {
              return {
                text,
                diff: countDiff(text, data.text),
              }
            })
            .reduce((a, b) => a.diff <= b.diff ? a : b) // å¤§æ–‡å­—ã«è¿‘ã„ã»ã†ã‚’æ¡ç”¨ã™ã‚‹
            .text
          
          return {
            text: almostSameText,
            size: data.size,
          }

      resolve(words)
    })
  })
}

/**

  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {

import { PubSub } from 'apollo-server';
import { users, generateId } from './db';
const pubsub = new PubSub();

const EVENT = {
    USER_CRAETED: 'userCreated',
    USER_UPDATED: 'userUpdated',
    USER_DELETED: 'userDeleted',
};

const resolvers = {    
  // ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»
  Mutation: {
    createUser: (parent, { name, email, age }, context, info) => {

      pubsub.publish(EVENT.USER_CRAETED, {[EVENT.USER_CRAETED]: newUser});
      return newUser;
    },
    updateUser: (parent, { id, name, email, age }, context, info) => {
      const updatedUser = users.find(user => user.id == id);
      updatedUser.name = name;
      updatedUser.email = email;
      updatedUser.age = age;

      pubsub.publish(EVENT.USER_UPDATED, {[EVENT.USER_UPDATED]: updatedUser});
      return updatedUser;
    },
    deleteUser: (parent, { id }, context, info) => {
      const userIndex = users.findIndex(user => user.id == id);
      
      if (userIndex === -1) throw new Error('User not found');
      const [deletedUser] = users.splice(userIndex, 1);
      
      pubsub.publish(EVENT.USER_DELETED, {[EVENT.USER_DELETED]: deletedUser});
      return deletedUser;
    }
  },
  Subscription: {
    [EVENT.USER_CRAETED]: {
      subscribe: () => pubsub.asyncIterator([EVENT.USER_CRAETED])
    },
    [EVENT.USER_UPDATED]: {
      subscribe: () => pubsub.asyncIterator([EVENT.USER_UPDATED])
    },
    [EVENT.USER_DELETED]: {
      subscribe: () => pubsub.asyncIterator([EVENT.USER_DELETED])
    },
  },
  // ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»
};

function craeteFramePolygonPoints(
  coverSlitWidth,  // ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼ã®éš™é–“å¹…
  coverWidth,      // ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼å…¨ä½“ã®å¹…
  coverHeight,     // ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼å…¨ä½“ã®é«˜ã•
  frameCount,      // ã‚³ãƒæ•°
  frameIndex       // ä½•ç•ªç›®ã®ã‚³ãƒã‹
) {

  // ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼ã®éš™é–“ã‚’é…ç½®ã™ã‚‹é–“éš”
  const unitWidth = coverSlitWidth * frameCount;
  // éš™é–“ã‚’ä½•å€‹ä¸¦ã¹ã‚‹ã‹
  const unitCount = Math.floor(coverWidth / unitWidth);

  // æ«›å‹ã¨polygonã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
  return range(unitCount)
    .map(i =>
      range(frameCount, 1)
        .filter(i => i % frameCount === frameIndex  % frameCount)
        .map(countInUnit => {
          const offset = i * unitWidth
          const offsetInUnit = (countInUnit - 1) * coverSlitWidth
          const xStart =  offset + offsetInUnit
          const xEnd = xStart + coverSlitWidth
          const yStart = 0
          const yEnd = coverHeight

          return `${xStart}px ${yStart}px,` +
            `${xStart}px ${yEnd}px,` +
            `${xEnd}px ${yEnd}px,` +
            `${xEnd}px ${yStart}px`
        })
        .join(`,`)
    )
    .join(`,`);
}

// è£œåŠ©é–¢æ•°
function range(size, startAt = 0) {
  return [...Array(size).keys()].map(i => i + startAt);
}

import styled from 'styled-components'

const SlitAnimationFrame = (props) => {

  const {
    coverSlitWidth = 1,
    imageWidth = 500,
    imageHeight = 500,
    frameIndex,
    frameCount,
    image
  } = props;

  if (!frameIndex && frameIndex !== 0) {
    throw 'You need to set frameIndex.';
  }

  if (!frameCount) {
    throw 'You need to set frameCount.';
  }

  if (frameCount - 1 < frameIndex) {
    throw 'You need to set frameIndex which is smaller then lastIndex of frame.';
  }

  if (!image) {
    throw 'You need to set image.';
  }

  // ç¸ã€…ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ä½¿ã†
  const freamePolygonPoints = craeteFramePolygonPoints(
    coverSlitWidth,
    imageWidth,
    imageHeight,
    frameCount,
    frameIndex
  );


  const FrameImage = styled.img`
    position: absolute;
    width: ${imageWidth}px;
    height: ${imageHeight}px;
    display: block;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
    -ms-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
    transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
    -webkit-clip-path: polygon(${freamePolygonPoints});
    clip-path: polygon(${freamePolygonPoints});
  `;

  return <FrameImage key={frameIndex} src={image} />;
}

import styled from 'styled-components'

const SlitAnimationCover = (props) => {

  const {
    frameCount, //required
    coverWidth = 500,
    coverHeight = 500,
    coverColor = '#000',
    coverSlitWidth = 1,
    startAt = 0,
    endAt = coverWidth,
    duration = 50,
  } = props;

  if (!frameCount && frameCount !== 0) {
    throw 'You need to set frameCount.';
  }

  // ã“ã“ã§ã‚‚ç¸ã€…ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ä½¿ã†
  const coverPolygonPoints = craeteCoverPolygonPoints(
    coverSlitWidth,

  );

  const CoverDiv = styled.div`
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;
    width: ${coverWidth}px;
    height: ${coverHeight}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    &:after {
      top: 0;
      left: ${startAt}px;
      position: absolute;
      content: '';
      display: block;
      width: ${coverWidth}px;
      height: ${coverHeight}px;
      background: ${coverColor};
      -webkit-clip-path: polygon(${coverPolygonPoints});

    }
    &:hover:after {
      left: ${endAt}px;
      transition: left ${duration}s linear;
    }
  `;

  return <CoverDiv />;
}

import React, { Component } from 'react';
import styled from 'styled-components'


const SlitAnimation = (props) =>  {
  const {
    images, // required
    imageWidth = 500,
    imageHeight = 500,
    coverWidth = imageWidth,
    coverHeight = imageHeight,
    coverColor = '#000',
    coverSlitWidth = 1,
    startAt = 0,
    endAt = coverWidth,
    duration = 50,
  } = props;

  if (!images || images.length === 0) {
    throw 'You need to set images.';
  }

  const frameCount = images.length;

  const cover = <SlitAnimationCover {...{
    frameCount,
    coverWidth,
    coverHeight,
    coverColor,
    coverSlitWidth,
    startAt,
    endAt,
    duration
  }}/>;

  const frame = range(frameCount).map(frameIndex =>
    <SlitAnimationFrame {...{
      coverSlitWidth,
      imageWidth,
      imageHeight,
      frameCount,
      frameIndex,
      image: images[frameIndex]
    }} />
  );

  const Container = styled.div`
    position: relative;
    width: ${coverWidth}px;
    height: ${coverHeight}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  `;

  return <Container>{frame}{cover}</Container>;
}

function _extractToc(rawMarkdownBody) {
  githubSlugger.reset();

  const result = []
  const ast = remark().parse(rawMarkdownBody);
  visit(ast, 'heading', child => {
    const value = child.children[0].value
    const id = githubSlugger.slug(value || mdastToString(child))
    const depth = child.depth
    result.push({
      value,
      id,
      depth
    })
  })

  return result
}

import React from 'react';

class ScrollSyncToc extends React.Component {
  constructor(props, context) {
    super(props, context);

    this.toc = _getToc(this.props.rawMarkdownBody)

    this.state = {
      activeItemIds: [],
      itemTopOffsets: [],
    };

    this.calculateItemTopOffsets = this.calculateItemTopOffsets.bind(this);
    this.handleScroll = throttle(this.handleScroll.bind(this), 100) // è² è·è»½æ¸›ã®ãŸã‚é–“å¼•ã
  }

  componentDidMount() {
    this.calculateItemTopOffsets();
    window.addEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);
  }

  componentWillUnmount() {
    window.removeEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);
  }

  calculateItemTopOffsets() {
    this.setState({
      itemTopOffsets: _getElementTopOffsetsById(this.toc),
    });
  }

  handleScroll() {
    const { itemTopOffsets } = this.state;

    const item = itemTopOffsets.find((current, i) => {
      const next = itemTopOffsets[i + 1]

      // è‡ªç« ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹
      // ã‹ã¤ æ¬¡ç« ã¾ã§ã¯ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ å ´åˆã¯
      // è‡ªç« ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã¿ãªã™
      return next

    })

    // itemTopOffsetsã§ã¯è¦ªç« ã®å‚ç…§ã‚‚æŒãŸã›ã¦ãŠã
    // ã“ã“ã§activeItemIdsã«æ ¼ç´ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    const activeItemIds =
      item
        ? item.parents
          ? [item.id, ...item.parents.map(i => i.id)]
          : [item.id]
        : [];

    // setStateã‚’ä»‹ã—ã¦stateã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§
    // è¡¨ç¤ºä¸­ã®ç« ã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ã®ã¿å†æç”»ãŒèµ°ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
    this.setState({activeItemIds});
  }

  render() {
    const { activeItemIds } = this.state;
    return <Toc activeItemIds={activeItemIds} toc={this.toc} {...this.props} />;
  }
}

import React from 'react'
import { HashLink as Link } from 'react-router-hash-link';

class Toc extends React.Component {
  render() {
    const { toc, activeItemIds } = this.props;
    const items = toc.map(item => {
      return (
        <li style={{
          textAlign: 'left',
          marginLeft: `${(item.depth - 2) * 24}px`,
          listStyle: 'none'
          }}>
          <Link
            key={item.id}
            to={`#${item.id}`}
            className={activeItemIds.includes(item.id) ? 'active' : ''}>{item.value}</Link>
        </li>
      )
    })

    return (
      <ul style={{padding: '12px', background: '#eee'}}>
        {items}
      </ul>
    );
  }
}

export default Toc;

import {

} from '../config/blog-config.js';

export default function Ogp({isRoot, title, description}) {

      <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary" />

    </Helmet>
  )
}
